Author: axod
Content: So streaming a friends music collection to your PC is fine, but streaming it to an ipod isn't?\nI'm not sure the legalities of this hold water personally.\nSuch muddiness when it comes to this sort of thing.

Author: jyu
Content:
This is a poorly asked question. You don't give any details, and worse, I don't really know what your situation is, or at least the number of visitors your site gets. In addition, ad network partners are really dependent on the type of traffic you're getting. Is your site a niche car site, or clothing, or something easily monetizable, or are you getting traffic that more resembles myspace?

Re-write your situation and question with more details, and I'm sure a bunch of people can chime in with good advice.

Author: jyu
Title: What's the deal with Virtualization?
Content:
Why is virtualization becoming such a hot topic? It seems as if EMC's acquisition of VMWare revived it, and its stock. Xen and Microsoft's virtualization software is also becoming a topic of recent discussions.

I don't get it. What is so important about virtualization? and how is this different from cloud computing?

Author: tlrobinson
Content:
It might be interesting to see a scatter plot of number of submissions/comments vs. average points per submission/comment.

What would be really cool is if you opened up a simple API or just the raw data so we could go wild with it :)

Author: davidw
Content: My strong preference is to down enough gin and tonics to get my brain off the fact that I'm way, way, way too high up in the air, a thought that it does not relinquish easily.

Author: carpo
Content: I've got a vps at slicehost and they've been great - would definately recommend them. For my next project im thinking of going Joyent, as their storage seems more scalable. I was thinking of using Amazon S3 with Slicehost, but am worried about the speed. The bandwidth costs seem pretty expensive too.

Author: mixmax
Content:
Well unless your friends are your core audience you should be wary of that approach. You tend to hang out with people that hold the same values that you do yourself. If you think that they are representative of the population as a whole you are headed for trouble.

Just saying... :-)
